name: Asteroids 2020 RMK
description:
Asteroids 2020 RMK is a remake of the legendary game asteroids of Atari!

Control your spaceship and destroy those meteors

Play Solo or Coop!

Survive as long as you can

HOW TO PLAY Special Thanks for: -My little Brother that helped me with the pixel art  -DimensionLord - Creator of the song:  "Neo´s sunglasses" -Nicolae Berbece (Xelu) - Creator of the pack of keyboard and controllers prompt -All my friends and family that supported me
